entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 11 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 11 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon except minus 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon except minus 9 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
